pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
